plot outline: Deep and Payal's love story takes a twist when Mousumi and Akash come to their town for a music performance. Deep is pushed to leaps of success by Mousumi while Payal assumes she's lost him and Akash finds ways to win Mousumi back. Will the four be able to reconcile or will misunderstandings rip them apart?
title: Sagar Kinare
plot: Deep and Payal's love story takes a twist when Mousumi and Akash come to their town for a music performance. Deep is pushed to leaps of success by Mousumi while Payal assumes she's lost him and Akash finds ways to win Mousumi back. Will the four be able to reconcile or will misunderstandings rip them apart?
